divs: Sighting DetailsI was travelling down the M180 on the 14,11,2008 at 11.30 when i notive on the horizon a cluster of what at first i thought was the 'Plough' star formation'. This at first i accepted but as i was travelling in a northerly direction for 10 miles the objects that made up this formation went from west to east. I pulled over and got out of my car, glancing up at them they were what seemed to be in formation in a sorte' type pattern. They were travelling at the same speed i would sy that a commercial jet would be on a gears down' approach to an airport, They were all the same shape but for a few smaller only slight and all the same colour. There was no sound, no strobe flashing, no smell, at one point i counted 15 in line with more coming at the time that i was talking to my partner on my mobile phone explaining what i was witnessing. I was at the time very calm, not upset or confused at what i saw but in awe at the spectaculsr 'fly past'. When they had past my vehicle i got back inside and looked up again to see the last one had dissapeared. I started travelling on my journey north and could not see them any more.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lincolnshire
There were no other sightings in Lincolnshire on or around November 14th 2008
